metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: There is also a foreach loop, which is used exclusively to loop through elements in an array (or other data sets):
content.html: There is also a foreach loop, which is used exclusively to loop through elements in an array (or other data sets):

content.code_html:
foreach (type variableName in arrayName) 
{
  // code block to be executed
}

content.text: The following example outputs all elements in the cars array, using a foreach loop:
content.html: The following example outputs all elements in the cars array, using a foreach loop:

content.code:
string
[
]
cars
=

{
"Volvo"
,

"BMW"
,

"Ford"
,

"Mazda"
}
;


foreach

(
string
i
in
cars
)


{

Console
.
WriteLine
(
i
)
;


}
content.code_html:
string[] cars = {"Volvo", "BMW", "Ford", "Mazda"};
foreach (string i in cars) 
{
  Console.WriteLine(i);
}

content.text: Note: Don't worry if you don't understand the example above. You will learn more about Arrays in the C# Arrays chapter .
content.html: Note: Don't worry if you don't understand the example above. You will learn more about Arrays in the C# Arrays chapter.
